extension.summary: Simplified fork of Kodi's default skin Confluence.
extension.description: Fluency is a modified version of Confluence. Rather than being a completely different experience, it tries to maintain the full compatibility with everything while removing excess clutter from the UI. Highly opinionated changes. Simplicity and focus on content and function is the name of the game.
extension.disclaimer: No support guaranteed, use Confluence if you have problems.
